skills.name: Solve simple word problems involving integer lengths

explanations.A: The grasshopper jumps 8cm and then 6cm. 8 + 6 = 14, so that's 14cm altogether.
explanations.B: I think you miscounted the cm... If you're using the ruler, make sure you jump along once for every cm, 8 jumps and then 6 jumps.
explanations.C: Maybe you thought the grasshopper jumped backwards 6cm? Both of these jumps are in the same direction, so we add them together to find out where the grasshopper lands.
explanations.D: I think you miscounted the cm... If you're using the ruler, make sure you jump along once for every cm, 8 jumps and then 6 jumps.
